article.title: General Dynamics Awarded Naval Surface Warfare Center Support Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Navy's Naval Surface Warfare Center has awarded General Dynamics Information Technology a contract for hull, mechanical, electrical and electronic systems alterations installation team support. General Dynamics is one of six firms awarded the five-year, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with a potential value of $475 million.
